p: The seeds of V. anthelmintica (batch number: Z30031501) were purchased in March 2016, from Xinjiang Meditsina Uyghur pharmaceutical Co., Ltd, Xinjiang, China. Voucher specimen has been deposited at the herbarium (Voucher no. WY02316), Xinjiang Institute of Ecology and Geography. Plant materials were identified by Professor Feng Ying from Xinjiang Institute of Ecology and Geography, Chinese Academy of Science.
